title.value: Characteristics of a model of medical device

description.value: This profile constrains the base resource DeviceDefinition to represent a model of device in a catalog of medical devices

definition.value: This repeatable element is used in catalogs of devices to convey the identifiers assigned to the model of device, other than the primary UDI DI.

comment.value: identifier may convey for instance, the secondary UDI-DI, the direct -marking UDI-DI, the unit-of-use UDI-DI, The primary UDI-DI is not conveyed by this element, it goes into the udiDeviceIdentifier element. other occurrences of identifier may also be used to convey additional non-UDI identifiers if needed.
